dd.ui:msg: Once your complementary class is confirmed and your instructional period is beginning, send an invitation through LinguaeLive to your own students. This invitation asks each student to sign up for your LinguaeLive class. Upon signup, students will be prompted to find a partner in the complementary class. Remind your students that they must attend to the target time zone when they list their availability. They must be available during mutually convenient times.
